attributes.action: We demand a general election to remove the Labour Party from power.
attributes.additional_details: Labour’s weak performance is driven by broken promises, divisive policies, and a failure to counter growing political opposition. In less than a year, the government is already struggling to turn its mandate into real progress. Public sentiment leans more toward disappointment than optimism
attributes.background: We call for the government to step down and back Reform UK as the leading party, as Labour has failed to deliver on its promises

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
